/*
Sab moh maya hai
 _._ _..._ .-',     _.._(`))
'-. `     '  /-._.-'    ',/
   )         \            '.
  / _    _    |             \
 |  a    a    /              |
 \   .-.                     ;
  '-('' ).-'       ,'       ;
     '-;           |      .'
        \           \    /
        | 7  .__  _.-\   \
        | |  |  ``/  /`  /
       /,_|  |   /,_/   /
          /,_/      '`-'
*/
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
typedef vector<int> vi;
typedef pair<int,int> pii;
typedef pair<ll,ll> pll;
typedef vector<pii> vpii;
typedef unsigned long long llu;

#define debug(x) cerr<<#x<<" "<<x<<endl;
#define f first
#define s second
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
ll high,lo,n,k,mid,ans,A[1000+100];  // n machines k objects;
int main()
{
    scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&k);
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        scanf("%lld",&A[i]);
    lo=1;
    high=1e16;
    while(lo<high)
    {   ans=0;
        mid=(lo+high)/2;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
         ans=ans+mid/A[i];
         if(ans>=k)
          high=mid;
        else
            lo=mid+1;
    }
    printf("%lld\n",lo);
return 0;
}
